record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW
record.narrative:
HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW -- (House of Representatives - June 17, 2008)

[Page: H5457]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 9:30 a.m. tomorrow.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
